title: Create a Fan Loyalty Challenge
description: A marketing manager wants to create a challenge in the mobile app where fans earn extra loyalty points for attending three consecutive home games.

tasks.description: Define the rules for the new challenge in the loyalty program system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the challenge: attend three consecutive home games to earn 500 bonus points.

tasks.description: Promote the new challenge to fans via a push notification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a notification announcing the challenge.

tasks.description: Monitor fan attendance to track progress towards the challenge.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically tracks which fans have completed the challenge.

tasks.description: Automatically award the bonus points to fans who complete the challenge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Fans who attend their third consecutive game automatically receive the bonus points.
